issues.title: NX release patch bumps dependents of prereleases
issues.bodyPreview:
### Current Behavior

Running `nx release` bumps `lib` to `1.1.0-0`, and `app` to `1.0.1`

### Expected Behavior

Running `nx release` should instead bump `app` to `1.0.1-0` (a prepatch)

### GitHub R...
